description:
Note: Price will increase in December 2015!

Are you, or is someone you know, being stalked or harassed?

Unfortunately, stalking, bullying, and harassment affect millions of people every year. This new course - launched in 2015 - provides an introduction and overview on stalkers, anti-stalking, and more.

The AntiStalkers course has a simple structure, unlike some other materials available, to allow students to more easily learn and understand the information:

Section 1: Introduction:

Stats: stalkers, victims, others Definitions Summary of laws

Section 2: Main Course Section

Behavior People Choices

The course was prepared via countless hours of research, and from discussing the need for answers from real people like you. If you are interested in finding out more, enroll now and start learning!
title: AntiStalkers: Stop Stalkers, Harassment, Cyberstalking Now!
